articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google brings Gemini to the Google TV Streamer - TechCrunch
articles.description: The tech giant says the change will enable users to use their voice more naturally to access content and more.
articles.content: Google announced on Monday that it’s starting to roll out Gemini to the Google TV Streamer, replacing Google Assistant. The tech giant says the change will enable users to use their voice more natura… [+1715 chars]
